greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = a(n-1) - a(n-2), with a(0)=2, a(1)=-1.
reference: Rosen, Discrete Mathematics and its Applications, McGraw-Hill, 2007, p. 456, Question 1b.
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,-1).
maple: a[0] := 2: a[1] := -1: for n from 2 to 80 do a[n] := a[n-1]-a[n-2] end do: seq(a[n], n = 0 .. 75); # _Emeric Deutsch_, Apr 05 2010
results.author: Zachary Berger (zsb1244(AT)rit.edu), Mar 28 2010
ext: Typo in definition fixed by _Emeric Deutsch_, Apr 05 2010
